title: What are some guidelines to writing a good speech? - Quora

response.answer_text: Your speech should be audience based. If i have to deliver speech on same topic, say, 'pollution'. I will have to deliver two completely different speeches for diffrent age groups.Try to divide your speech into 3 major parts. Past-present-future.orPurpose-speech content- conclusion.These small tips cause greater effect :)Take care!

Read a lot about the topic you have to write about. Don't mark facts but understand the context, the issues,proposed solutions,your views. Think everything clearly. Then start writing. You would find it effortless. See the correct opening and closing formats from sample speeches online.All the best!
